Ali's JSON-RPC Framework documentation

1.0

Description
This framework aims to provide JSON-RPC support to your Objective-C programs. Its role is to have a simple API to query any WebService that can be called using JSON-RPC.
This framework currently support JSON-RPC 1.0 and 2.0.
  • Overview
  • Error management
    • Catching Errors
    • The different error cases and their error domains
  • Example
Author:
O.Halligon
Version:
1.0
Date:
May 2010
Warning:
Even if the JSON object returned by the server is not normalized, this framework expect the object in the 'error' key of the JSON response to have the same structure than the one defined in the JSON-RPC 2.0 specification, i.e. a JSON complex object containing the three keys/properties "code", "message" and "data", as NSError objects are constructing using the "code", "message" and "data" properties of the JSON error object.
Note:
The JSON part is assured through the SBJSON framework.
